content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I am glad you are interested in my apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, I would like to clarify that I am a landlord and my primary goal is to maximize my gains. Therefore, I would like to negotiate the rental price to ensure that I receive the best possible compensation for my property. May I know what rental price you are willing to pay for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month. Thank you for considering my offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Max. While I appreciate your willingness to pay, I am afraid that I cannot accept your proposal of 500 Euros per month. My property is in a prime location in Munich and I believe that it is worth more than that. I am open to discussing a higher rental price that reflects the true value of the apartment. May I suggest that we negotiate further to find a mutually beneficial agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your concerns, but I cannot afford to pay more than 500 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding. I will have to look for another apartment.
TERMINATE.
Thank you for your time. Goodbye.
Best regards,
Max Müller
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Max. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am afraid that I cannot accept your offer of 500 Euros per month. My property is in a prime location in Munich and I believe that it is worth more than that. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and I wish you the best of luck in your search for another apartment. If you ever change your mind and are willing to pay a higher rental price, please do not hesitate to contact me.
name: Heinrich Heine
